DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate afterschool program teach nutrition basic cooking skill . This school extracurricular program increase student ' confidence , knowledge , skills cook one first step dietary improvement . In addition life lesson student learn class , gain self-confidence become self-sufficient culinary expert capable educate sibling , parent , social circle . This research project test impact program nutritional knowledge , culinary efficacy , nutritional choice make home . The Pink Dude Chef Afterschool Cooking Program develop STRIDE ( Science Translational Research Diet Exercise California Polytechnic state University ( Cal Poly ) San Luis Obispo , CA . Hypothesis : Middle school student participate Pink Dude Chef afterschool cook program increase nutritional knowledge , culinary efficacy , motivation eat fruit vegetable , fruit vegetable intake compare attention control group .
DOC.criteria: Middle school age child parent willing partcipate Ability partipate afterschool program Less great middle school age
